title: I feel as if I'm too good at the game.

embed.description: I can't even be serious anymore, full sarcasm is the only way to remain sane.

body: I need nerfs. This game isn't hard enough like this.

replies.body: I have had issues with this game since it came out. Nothing ever gets resolved. First time it got this bad so maybe it's something more than normal but for me 500 ping is a daily thing on very expensive internet that does not fail at any other game.

> [{quoted}](name=moltendorf,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Etlk2O1Q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-11T10:31:14.461+0000)
>
> I have had issues with this game since it came out. Nothing ever gets resolved. First time it got this bad so maybe it's something more than normal but for me 500 ping is a daily thing on very expensive internet that does not fail at any other game.

Like I said, I spend a good amount on my net as well, because I have to do things outside of league obviously that require net. Along with my TV and phones and thus I try not to run it all when playing the game, but it doesn't stop it from having packet loss/buffering issues. Also I see you're in NA and most net providers here suck no matter how much you spend.

It looks like your network is having an issue and causing you to have packet loss, or input delays.  I suggest going through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  This will help rule out issues not related to your ISP and hopefully get you back in the game without problems.  Let me know if you have any issues afterward!

Had the same issue, was told to run the packet loss/buffering diagnostic test which is given in the support area of the site. There should be a long list of how to fix certain issues you have with league and your comp. Basically I ran the test found out there was an issue with my ISP, called them the next day, found that there was an issue and got it resolved, played tonight with none of this.
